com.github.misberner.apcommons.reporting

Class RootReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.misberner.apcommons.reporting.AbstractReporter
      • com.github.misberner.apcommons.reporting.RootReporter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Reporter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ElementReporter

    public class RootReporter
extends AbstractReporter
    A Reporter that prints messages using the Messager of a given ProcessingEnvironment.
    Author:
    Malte Isberner
    See Also:
    Messager, ProcessingEnvironment.getMessager()
